## Description
The Delivery Drone is an unmanned aerial vehicle used for dropping off light cargo at nearby depots and settlements.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Type:|DELIVERY_DRONE|
|Model:|A|
|Base Speed:|40.0 kmph|
|Crew Size:|0|
|Empty Mass:| kg|
|Width:|1.75|
|Length:|1.75|
|Fuel Efficiency:|0.95|
|Attachment Slots:|0|
